text: Motivation - How do you change it from fear to fun?
So if you are like me in your 9 to 5 job, your motivation goes pretty much in this order...
I'd say it is 80% fear, 15% pressure, and 5% fun.
Like most, I want to flip 1 and 3 (can't control 2).
But with the years of habit accumulation, not only by me but my family, it is hard to "risk it all".
How would you flip fear for fun?
